verses.roman:
āra alaukika eka caritra tāṅhāra
yāhāra śravaṇe loke haya camatkāra

synonyms: āra—another; alaukika—uncommon; eka—one; caritra—characteristic; tāṅhāra—of Haridāsa Ṭhākura; yāhāra śravaṇe—in hearing which; loke—in human society; haya—there is; camatkāra—astonishment.
translation: There is another incident concerning Haridāsa Ṭhākura's uncommon behavior. One will be astonished to hear about it.
